column2: Master in Artificial Intelligence and Humanities

column2: Bachelor in Philosophy and Artificial Intelligence
column5: The program at Sapienza University of Rome combines philosophical inquiry with AI studies, emphasizing a multidisciplinary approach.
This interdisciplinary master's program at Politecnico di Torino integrates humanities with technology, focusing on AI and digital competencies.

column2: AI, Data Science, and Machine Learning - CMU Portugal Academy

column2: Digital Learning and ICT in Education
column5: The European Commission aims to modernize education and training by funding research and innovation and promoting digital technologies for learning.
